body:
In RFC 2616 from 1999:

```
       message-header = field-name ":" [ field-value ]
       field-name     = token
...
       token          = 1*<any CHAR except CTLs or separators>
       separators     = "(" | ")" | "<" | ">" | "@"
                      | "," | ";" | ":" | "\" | <">
                      | "/" | "[" | "]" | "?" | "="
                      | "{" | "}" | SP | HT
```

Note that SP (space) was always forbidden.
